remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化控件将执行插入操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 参数都可用作集合所访问的属性，公开的对象。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初，显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识哪一种方法执行插入操作。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数插入数据。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因的字符串集合控制权将会传递自动是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托是处理对象事件并使你能够操作之前的输入的参数操作继续进行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个创建使用字符串的集合，并添加到使用参数名称的集合 (`ne`) 的方法需要。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用现有的中间层对象作为带有类型和专门用于不设计的方法的数据源时，你可能执行类似这样的步骤控件。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 当执行操作，则由标识的方法调用属性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`对象的方法有一个方法签名，包括参数，集合必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数方法才能成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例由两个基本类组成：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是无状态的封装业务逻辑。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，它是仅包含的基本功能所需进行加载和保持数据层中的数据的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供为方便起见。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你将不将数据插入 Northwind Traders 数据库时使用此示例进行试验。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/northwindemployee4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/northwindemployee4.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件调用以插入数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to insert data.

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to insert data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定的业务对象一次，而不是批处理中插入一条数据记录。The business object is assumed to insert data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象对象。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the object. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 由标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁指定的方法的每次调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 你可以处理和事件以使用在之前的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the property is called. 你还可以处理由指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现接口，销毁该对象前调用方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，将永远不会创建业务对象，并且无法处理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合并的参数Parameter Merging 参数添加到从三个源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 从数据绑定控件，在运行时。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从`InsertParameters`元素，以声明方式。From the `InsertParameters` element, declaratively. - 从`Inserting`方法，以编程方式。From the `Inserting` method, programmatically. 首先，将通过数据绑定控件生成的任何参数添加到集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果控件绑定到具有列控件`Name`和`Number`的参数`Name`和`Number`添加到集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 这些参数的数据类型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步、 中列出的参数`InsertParameters`添加元素。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `InsertParameters` element are added. 如果中的参数`InsertParameters`元素找到具有相同名称作为参数中已被修改集合，现有的参数以匹配中指定的参数`InsertParameters`元素。If a parameter in the `InsertParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `InsertParameters` element. 通常，这用于修改在参数中的数据的类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，你可以以编程方式添加和删除中的参数事件，发生之前运行方法。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 对参数进行合并后，该方法将得到解决。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 在下一部分中讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 当调用方法时，从该数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`InsertParameters`元素和参数中的新增所有合并事件处理程序。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `InsertParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。对象会尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The object then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与属性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则引发异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设由指定的类型属性有两个方法名为`InsertARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `InsertARecord`. 一个`InsertARecord`具有一个参数、 `ID`，以及其他`InsertARecord`具有两个参数，`Name`和`Number`。One `InsertARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `InsertARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合仅有一个参数名为`ID`、`InsertARecord`方法只需`ID`调用参数。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `InsertARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 参数的类型未签入解决方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置属性，以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 具有中指定的名称的方法中寻找属性，它采用一个类型的参数中指定属性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初，显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。Initially, the displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识哪一种方法执行插入操作。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数插入数据。In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因的字符串集合控制权将会传递自动是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托是处理对象事件并使你能够操作之前的输入的参数操作继续进行。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个创建使用字符串的集合，并添加到使用参数名称的集合 (`ne`) 的方法需要。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用现有的中间层对象作为带有类型和专门用于不设计的方法的数据源时，你可能执行类似这样的步骤控件。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 当执行操作，则由标识的方法调用属性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果`Insert`对象的方法有一个方法签名，包括参数，集合必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数方法才能成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和中包含的参数类型集合的名称和中的参数类型必须匹配属性签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the property signature. 参数名称区分大小写。The parameter names are case sensitive. 使用提供参数，如数据绑定控件时和控件，控件自动合并带有参数的集合中显式指定任何参数提供的数据绑定控件。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as the and controls, the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with the parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 这是重要的因为数据绑定控件始终提供其参数作为类型，并且，如果方法签名包含数字或日期类型，你必须显式包含中的参数与正确的类型的集合。This is important because data-bound controls always supply their parameters as types, and if the method signature includes numeric or date types, you must explicitly include a parameter in the collection with the correct type. 否则为控件尝试根据集合中的参数定义的类型参数强制转换。Otherwise, the control attempts to cast the parameters according to the type that is defined by the parameters in the collection. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索所包含的属性关联控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供的示例实现`Insert`第一个代码示例中使用的方法。The second code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初，显示文本框中，你可以在其中输入对新的数据`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。Initially, the displays text boxes in which you can enter data for a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 数据输入到的字段后控件中，单击**插入**按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识哪一种方法执行插入操作。The property identifies which method performs the insert operation. 如果你单击**插入**按钮，该操作使用由指定的方法来执行属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Insert** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，一个参数中指定对应监护人的 ID 的集合In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID. 这是因为即使的 ID 显示在集合控件用作对象，它将作为连接到的字符串传递控件。This is because even though the ID is displayed in the collection for the control as a object, it is passed as a string to the control. 通过将它添加到显式具有集合属性设置为值，它将传递正确通过到该方法为，而不是一个字符串。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property set to the value, it will be passed correctly by the to the method as an , not as a string. 当执行操作，则由标识的方法调用属性。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的方法有一个方法签名，包括参数，集合必须包含具有与匹配的方法签名参数名称的参数方法才能成功完成。If the method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain parameters that have names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/CS/objds8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_8/VB/objds8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供的示例实现`Insert`前面的代码示例使用的方法。The following code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that the preceding code example uses. `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper`方法添加到`EmployeeLogic`中提供的中间层对象类概述，以使对象可以更轻松地使用中 Web 方案，而不必大量改写的实际控件业务逻辑。The `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` method is added to the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier object that is provided in the class overview to enable the object to work more easily with the control in Web scenarios, without a substantial rewrite to the actual business logic. 若要运行该示例，你必须`NorthwindEmployee`中提供的类类概述。To run the example, you must have the `NorthwindEmployee` class that is provided in the class overview. 此示例演示如何仅如何连接到业务对象方法，可获取新的数据库记录中使用的参数数据。This example illustrates only how to connect the to a business object method that gets data for a new database record by using parameters. 该示例因为不会添加记录到数据库，`Save`方法`NorthwindEmployee`类不包括代码以更新数据库。The example does not add records to the database, because the `Save` method of the `NorthwindEmployee` class does not include code to update the database. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的控件。The method is used to load the previously saved view state of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于支持数据源分页。The property is used to support data source paging. 有关如何通过支持分页信息控制，请参阅。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够选择多少条记录显示在页中的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含控制其属性设置为`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为在查询中返回的记录总数的方法的名称。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和属性设置为选择的方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示的处理程序事件控件。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 中的处理程序集的代码于用户的所选内容的属性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 在第三个示例从 Customers 表中检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，分配给属性控件。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为方法`GetEmployeeCount`，分配给属性控件。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询客户表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ObjectCreated As ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler

summary.span: 在创建由 属性标识的对象之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the object that is identified by the property is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件调用其他方法在业务对象上设置属性，或执行其他特定于之前的业务对象的初始化对象调用业务对象数据方法来执行数据操作.Handle the event to call other methods on the business object, set properties, or perform other initialization that is specific to the business object before the object calls the business object data method to perform a data operation. 对对象的引用可通过属性，公开的对象。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 如果标识以执行数据操作的方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则和永远不会引发事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ObjectCreating As ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler

summary.span: 在创建由 属性标识的对象之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the object that is identified by the property is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标识以执行数据操作的方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则和永远不会引发事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised. 控件将自动调用默认构造函数的业务对象来创建它使用反射的实例。The control automatically calls the default constructor of a business object to create an instance of it using reflection. 处理事件来显式调用另一个构造函数，并将结果传递给对象的实例设置属性关联的对象。Handle the event to explicitly call another constructor, and set the instance of the object that results to the property of the associated object. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象。The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 你可能使用业务对象是很大的开销 （在方面时间或资源） 创建 Web 页执行的每个数据操作。You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs. 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的实例，然后缓存它用于后续操作，而不是创建和销毁它执行每个数据操作。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. > [!NOTE] > 在生产应用程序，多个请求可能最终会同时使用同一个实例。In a production application, multiple requests might end up simultaneously using the same instance. 因此，需要采用线程安全的方式实现的对象。Therefore, the object needs to be implemented in a thread-safe manner. 此代码示例演示此模式。This code example demonstrates this pattern. 你可以处理事件，首先，检查对象的缓存，并仅创建的对象的实例，如果尚未缓存。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of the object, if one is not already cached. 然后，处理事件以缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此代码示例中，属性对象设置为`true`定向不要调用对象上的方法。In this code example, the property of the object is set to `true` to direct the to not call method on the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 该代码示例包含的基本业务对象，由定义`EmployeeLogic`类，它是封装业务逻辑的有状态类。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译为库此代码，并使用这些类从 ASP.NET 页 （.aspx 文件）。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ObjectDisposing As ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler

summary.span: 在丢弃由 属性标识的对象之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the object that is identified by the property is discarded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 丢弃业务对象的实例之前，始终将引发事件。The event is always raised before the instance of the business object is discarded. 如果业务对象实现接口，方法之后将引发此事件被调用。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called after this event is raised. 处理事件调用其他方法调用的对象上设置属性，或执行清理该对象被销毁之前即特定于该对象。Handle the event to call other methods on the object, set properties, or perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed. 对对象的引用可通过属性，公开的对象。A reference to the object is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 当你使用控件使用 LINQ to SQL 类，你必须取消的处理程序中的数据上下文类的释放事件。When you use a control with a LINQ to SQL class, you must cancel the disposing of the data-context class in an handler for the event. 此步骤是必需的因为 LINQ to SQL 支持延迟的执行，而控件尝试后选择操作释放的数据上下文。This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象。The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 你可能使用业务对象是很大的开销 （在方面时间或资源） 创建 Web 页执行的每个数据操作。You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs. 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的实例，然后缓存它用于后续操作，而不是创建和销毁它执行每个数据操作。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 你可以处理事件，首先，检查对象的缓存并只能创建它的实例，如果尚未缓存。You can handle the event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of it, if one is not already cached. 然后，处理事件以缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此代码示例中，属性对象设置为`true`定向不要调用对象上的方法。In this code example, the property of the object is set to `true` to direct the to not call the method on the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 该代码示例包含的基本业务对象，由定义`EmployeeLogic`类，它是封装业务逻辑的有状态类。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译为库此代码，并使用这些类从 ASP.NET 页 （.aspx 文件）。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何处理事件时使用使用 LINQ to SQL 类的控件。The following example shows how to handle the event when using an control with a LINQ to SQL class. ```vb Public Sub ExampleObjectDisposing(ByVal sender As Object, _ ByVal e As ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs) e.Cancel = True End Sub ``` ```csharp public void ExampleObjectDisposing(object sender, ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 或 方法的原始值的参数名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of the parameters for original values that are passed to the or methods.

value.span: 一个表示格式字符串的字符串，它应用于传递给 或 方法的任何 或键参数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any or key parameters passed to the or methods.

value.span: 默认值是"{0}"，这意味着参数名称是字段名称。

span.span: The default is "{0}", which means the parameter name is the field name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性如那些使用标识应用于仅，主键`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件，或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和原始值的集将传递到相应的数据方法。The value of the property is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value, and the set of original values are passed to the corresponding data method. 以下是两个常见的方案，你可能要更改属性：The following are two common scenarios where you might change the property: - 你可能想要更改属性，以区分中更新的旧和新值。You might want to change the property to differentiate between old and new values in updates. 当属性设置为值，参数的原始列值和新值添加到集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 没有格式设置字符串，将为每个数据字段创建具有相同名称的两个参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，你可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并比较键值的数据。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器实现原始值和键的特定命名的方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

summary.span: 将 事件处理程序添加到包含 控件的页。

span.span: Adds a event handler to the page that contains the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 通过用 集合中的参数调用由 属性标识的方法，从基础数据存储中检索数据。

span.span: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage by calling the method that is identified by the property with the parameters in the collection.

returns.span: 一个数据行的 列表。

span.span: An list of data rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可能具有任何方法签名，但它必须返回或派生自的以下表中列出的类型之一控件，若要成功调用。The specified method might have any method signature, but it must return or be derived from one of the types listed in the following table for the control to call it successfully. |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||返回方法。The is returned by the method.| ||A通过创建以及返回方法。A is created by using the and returned by the method.| ||返回方法。The is returned by the method.| ||第一个的提取和创建并返回方法。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||该对象包装在一个元素集合并返回方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element collection and returned by the method.| 由标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁由指定的方法的每次属性称为，只不过使用同一个实例调用的方法的指定属性和通过指定的方法属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called, except that the same instance is used to call the method that is specified by the property and the method that is specified by the property. 方法返回接口。The method returns an interface. 但是，若要启用缓存和筛选方案，返回的值必须是对象。However, to enable caching and filtering scenarios, the return value must be a object. 虽然类未实现接口，控件自动提取默认控制，该类实现。While the class does not implement the interface, the control automatically extracts the default control, which implements the . 之前执行操作，则调用方法来引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a operation. 若要执行数据检索操作，对象使用反射来创建由标识对象的实例属性。To perform a data retrieval operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 它然后调用由标识方法属性，使用任何关联属性。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 后操作完成，调用方法来引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理事件，以检查任何返回值、 输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 如果属性返回， ，或对象并启用了缓存，检索中的数据并将数据保存到在过程缓存操作。If the property returns a , , or object and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 创建缓存，丢弃，或刷新基于指定的组合的缓存行为和属性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. 如果属性返回或对象，和一个指定属性、 使用任何提供计算属性并将得到的筛选器应用过程中的数据的列表操作。If the property returns a or object, and a property has been specified, it is evaluated with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 方法会委托给方法关联控件。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 当与数据绑定控件，如关联控件控件，不需要调用从页的代码的方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 。For a code example, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectCountMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件调用以检索行数的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to retrieve a row count.

value.span: 表示 用于检索行数的方法或函数的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to retrieve a row count.

value.span: 此方法必须返回一个整数 ()。

span.span: The method must return an integer ().

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识用于检索总行数，以支持数据源分页的业务对象方法。The property identifies a business object method that is used to retrieve a total row count, to support data source paging. 时计算属性仅属性设置为`true`。The property is evaluated only if the property is set to `true`. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 有关如何通过支持分页信息控制，请参阅。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . ## Examples 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够选择多少条记录显示在页中的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含控制其属性设置为`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为在查询中返回的记录总数的方法的名称。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和属性设置为选择的方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示的处理程序事件控件。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 中的处理程序集的代码于用户的所选内容的属性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 在第三个示例从 Customers 表中检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，分配给属性控件。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为方法`GetEmployeeCount`，分配给属性控件。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询客户表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件检查返回值或输出参数的值，或者想要确定后是否引发了异常操作已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性就可以在与事件相关联的对象。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够检索和更新 Northwind 数据库中的 Employees 表中记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示一个网页，包含两个控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示从数据库的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索、 显示和修改中用户选定的员工记录的数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例演示处理程序和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序序列化包含员工表中检索到的数据的对象。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序反序列化中包含正在更新该数据记录的原始数据的视图状态的对象。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象作为参数传递给更新方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始数据必须传递到数据库，以便它可以用于检查是否已被其他进程修改数据。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 在第三个示例与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 查询和更新雇员表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和员工表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化控件将执行数据检索操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the data retrieval operation. 参数都可用作集合所访问的属性，公开的对象。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 可以为单个调用两次激发此事件方法，如果属性设置。This event can be fired twice for a single call to the method, if the property is set. 属性对象用于确定是否调用了选择要检索数据或检索的计数。The property of the object is used to determine if select was called to retrieve data or retrieve the count. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件调用以检索数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to retrieve data.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于检索数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to retrieve data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可以具有任何方法签名，但它必须返回针对下表中所示的类型之一控件，若要成功调用。The specified method can have any method signature, but it must return one of the types shown in the following table for the control to call it successfully. |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| ||返回方法。The is returned by the method.| ||A使用创建以及返回方法。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||A返回方法。A is returned by the method.| ||第一个的提取，和一个创建并返回方法。The first of the is extracted, and a is created and returned by the method.| ||该对象包装在一个元素集合并返回方法。The object is wrapped in a one-element collection and returned by the method.| 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 当你使用类以删除或更新数据，请确保参数名称为配置中控制集合或集合选择的方法返回的列名称匹配.When you use the class to delete or update data, make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection or collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 由标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁由指定的方法的每次调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 你可以处理和事件以使用指定的方法之前的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理由指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现接口，销毁该对象前调用方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，将永远不会创建业务对象，并且无法处理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合并的参数Parameter Merging 参数添加到从这些源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from these sources: - 以声明方式从`SelectParameters`元素。Declaratively from the `SelectParameters` element. - 以编程方式从`Selecting`方法。Programmatically from the `Selecting` method. 首先中, 列出的参数`SelectParameters`添加元素。First, the parameters listed in the `SelectParameters` element are added. 其次，参数将以编程方式添加和删除在事件，发生之前运行方法。Second, parameters are programmatically added and removed in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 对参数进行合并后，该方法将得到解决。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 在下一部分中讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 当调用方法时，从该数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`SelectParameters`元素和参数中的新增所有合并事件处理程序。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `SelectParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。控制然后尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与属性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则引发异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设由指定的类型属性有两个方法名为`SelectARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `SelectARecord`. 一个`SelectARecord`具有一个参数、 `ID`，以及其他`SelectARecord`具有两个参数，`Name`和`Number`。One `SelectARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `SelectARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合仅有一个参数名为`ID`、`SelectARecord`方法只需`ID`调用参数。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `SelectARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 参数的类型未签入解决方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置属性，以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 具有中指定的名称的方法中寻找属性，它采用一个类型的参数中指定属性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何控件可以显示数据使用Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识部分或完全限定的类名称替换其属性和方法调用使用来检索数据其属性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，创建对象并使用反射调用该方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举由指定的方法返回的集合属性，并显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the method that is specified by the property, and displays the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取参数的集合，这些参数由 属性指定的方法使用。

span.span: Gets a collection of parameters that are used by the method specified by the property.

value.span: 参数的集合，这些参数由 属性指定的方法使用。

span.span: A collection of parameters that are used by the method specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以获取属性与关联的对象控件。The property gets the property of the object that is associated with the control. 你将参数添加到以声明方式使用集合`SelectParameters`元素或以编程方式中的处理程序事件。You add parameters to the collection declaratively by using the `SelectParameters` element or programmatically in the handler for the event. 在运行时，参数将列出在`SelectParameters`元素添加到集合第一次。At run time, parameters listed in the `SelectParameters` element are added to the collection first. 然后添加或删除的处理程序集合中的参数事件。Parameters in the collection are then added or removed by the handler for the event. 事件之前，将引发运行方法。The event is raised before the method is run. 之前方法运行的名称和中包含的参数类型，集合必须与由指定的方法的签名匹配属性。Before the method is run, the names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the signature of the method that is specified by the property. 例如，如果一个名为的选择方法`GetEmployeesByStateAndAge`采用`string`和作为参数，一个整数集合必须包含两个参数。For example, if a select method named `GetEmployeesByStateAndAge` takes a `string` and an integer as parameters, the collection must contain two parameters. 第一个参数必须解析为字符串，并且第二个参数必须解析为整数。The first parameter must resolve to a string and the second parameter must resolve to an integer. 中的标记中，可以指定这两个参数`SelectParameters`元素。Both parameters can be specified in markup in the `SelectParameters` element. 或者，它们可以是可在中添加可在标记中添加事件处理程序或一个参数并可以以编程方式添加另一个。Alternatively, they can be can be added in the event handler, or one parameter can be added in markup and the other one can be added programmatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)和属性。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4) and the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 中的代码事件处理程序或由指定的方法中属性，请确保验证从客户端收到任何参数值。In the code for the event handler or in the method that is specified by the property, make sure that you validate any parameter value that is received from the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索单个数据记录使用控件，并将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control and display it in a control. 控件通过调用检索特定员工记录`GetEmployee`方法`EmployeeLogic`类。The control retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee`方法需要使用员工 ID 参数。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控件使用`QueryStringParameter`标记以创建中的元素对象，将从 URL 检索指定的查询字符串参数的值并将其传递到`GetEmployee`方法。The control uses a `QueryStringParameter` element in markup to create a object that will retrieve the value of a specified query-string parameter from the URL and pass it to the `GetEmployee` method. 可以使用其他参数类从其他源，例如控件属性、 窗体字段、 cookie、 ASP.NET 配置文件数据或会话状态中检索值。Other parameter classes can be used to retrieve values from other sources, such as control properties, form fields, cookies, ASP.NET profile data, or session state. 你还可以使用以便将硬编码的值传递给 select 方法在标记中定义的参数对象。You can also use a parameter object that is defined in markup in order to pass a hard-coded value to the select method. 有关可用的参数类的详细信息，请参阅[与用于筛选的数据源控件使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f)。For more information about parameter classes that are available, see [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88622d04-2989-484e-93fe-594cd98dcf5f). 若要运行此示例中，你将需要以下各项：To run this example, you will need the following: - 具有一个名为的连接字符串的网站`NorthwindConnection`连接到 Northwind Traders 数据库。A Web site that has a connection string named `NorthwindConnection` that connects to the Northwind Traders database. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. - `EmployeeLogic`类显示为一个代码示例的类概述。The `EmployeeLogic` class that is shown as one of the code examples for the class overview. 类文件必须位于 App_Code 文件夹中。The class file must be located in the App_Code folder. - 可以作为一个.aspx 页面中运行的示例代码。The sample code can be run as an .aspx page. 如果请求不含查询字符串参数的页面，将显示一条错误消息。If you request the page without a query-string parameter, an error message is displayed. 如果请求页面如使用查询字符串`?empid=1`.aspx 文件的名称，你将看到的详细信息所请求的员工。If you request the page using a query string such as `?empid=1` after the name of the .aspx file, you will see the details for the requested employee. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/CS/objds3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/VB/objds3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SortParameterName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置业务对象的名称， 参数使用此业务对象指定数据源排序支持的排序表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the business object that the parameter used to specify a sort expression for data source sorting support.

value.span: 方法参数的名称，此方法参数用于指示哪个参数用于排序数据。

span.span: The name of the method parameter used to indicate the parameter which is used to sort the data.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于支持数据源进行排序。The property is used to support data source sorting. 当上设置属性对象并传递给方法，值标识的参数名称业务对象方法对数据进行排序依据。When a property is set on the object and passed to the method, the value identifies the parameter name of the business object method according to which the data is sorted. 如果的数据绑定控件，传递给以逗号分隔的字段值的形式跟此参数的值与关联`"ASC"`或`"DESC"`。If the is associated with a data-bound control, the values that are passed to this parameter take the form of comma-separated field values followed by `"ASC"` or `"DESC"`. 例如上, 是按升序排序的值`Name`将`"Name ASC"`。For example, the value for an ascending sort on `Name` would be `"Name ASC"`. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何实现支持排序的类型。The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that supports sorting. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现的排序表达式。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a sort expression. 下面的代码示例演示如何实现支持排序的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that supports sorting. `SelectMethod`的`SortingData`类采用参数， `sortExpression`。The `SelectMethod` of the `SortingData` class takes a parameter, `sortExpression`. 字符串传递给`SelectMethod`用于属性返回的对象`SelectMethod`。The string that is passed to `SelectMethod` is used for the property of the object that is returned by `SelectMethod`. [!code-csharp[ObjectDataSourceSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/CS/SortingData.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjectDataSourceSorting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/VB/SortingData.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的排序表达式。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a sort expression. 在 Web 页的代码创建的实例控件。The code in the Web page creates an instance of the control. 属性设置为`SortingData`和属性设置为`sortExpression`。The property is set to `SortingData` and the property is set to `sortExpression`. 属性控件设置为`true`。The property of the control is set to `true`. 当用户单击**排序**按钮、 域名称`Name`或`Number`，传递给`SelectMethod`排序参数中。When the user clicks the **Sort** button, the field name, `Name` or `Number`, is passed to `SelectMethod` in the sort parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[ObjectDataSourceSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/CS/SortingDataExample.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[ObjectDataSourceSorting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceSorting/VB/SortingDataExampleVB.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string SqlCacheDependency { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property SqlCacheDependency As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SqlCacheDependency { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用分号分隔的字符串，指示用于 Microsoft SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the Microsoft SQL Server cache dependency.

value.span: 一个字符串，指示用于 SQL Server 缓存依赖项的数据库和表。

span.span: A string that indicates which databases and tables to use for the SQL Server cache dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持基于一个可选的到期策略（此服务必须配置为数据库服务器） 的数据缓存的对象。The control supports an optional expiration policy that is based on the object for the data cache (the service must be configured for the database server). 缓存失效的情况下，SQL Server 支持两种机制： 轮询和通知。SQL Server supports two mechanisms for cache invalidation: polling and notification. 每个机制有不同的语法为对象。Each mechanism has a different syntax for the object. 仅支持轮询。The supports only polling. 字符串用于创建对象传递给构造函数之前执行方法。The string is used to create a object that is passed to the constructor before the method is executed. 字符串标识数据库和表根据相同的格式由`@ Page`指令，其中字符串的第一部分是 SQL Server 数据库的连接字符串后, 跟一个冒号分隔符，以及最后的名称数据库表的 (例如， `"connectionstring1:table1"`)。The string identifies databases and tables according to the same format that is used by the `@ Page` directive, where the first part of the string is a connection string to a SQL Server database, followed by a colon delimiter, and finally the name of the database table (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1"`). 如果属性取决于多个表，之间用分号分隔的连接字符串和表名称对 (例如， `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`)。If the property depends on more than one table, the connection string and table name pairs are separated by semicolons (for example, `"connectionstring1:table1";connectionstring2:table2"`). 若要支持通知，必须编写的缓存逻辑的实现中你属性和处理的构造在代码中的对象。To support notification, you must write the cache logic in the implementation of your property and handle the construction of the object in your code. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 缓存依赖项并设置属性对象。The first code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a object. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现可返回包装方法对象，以允许的缓存和筛选对象。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an object. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 SQL Server 缓存依赖项并设置属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a SQL Server cache dependency and set the property of a control. 在此示例中，轮询一次数据库每隔 120 秒。In this example, the database is polled every 120 seconds. 如果在 Northwind Traders 员工数据在这个过程中表的更改时间，由缓存任何数据控制和显示控件已过期，并且上页的下一个请求中检索一组新的数据。If the data in the Northwind Traders Employees table changes during that time, any data that is cached by the control and displayed by the control is expired and a new set of data is retrieved on the next request for the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7/CS/objds7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_7/VB/objds7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现可返回包装方法对象，以允许的缓存和筛选控件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an control. 基实现中`EmployeeLogic`类，`GetAllEmployees`方法返回对象。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an object. 而不是重构对象完全处理的的包装器方法在 Web 窗体页中，名为`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`返回的一组添加`NorthwindEmployee`数据作为。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/CS/northwindemployee5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/VB/northwindemployee5.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ StartRowIndexParameterName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置数据检索方法参数的名称，该参数用于指示为数据源分页支持检索的第一条记录的标识符的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data retrieval method parameter that is used to indicate the value of the identifier of the first record to retrieve for data source paging support.

value.span: 业务对象方法参数的名称，该参数用于指示要检索的第一条记录。

span.span: The name of the business object method parameter used to indicate the first record to retrieve.

value.span: 该参数必须返回整数值。

span.span: The parameter must return an integer value.

value.span: 默认值是"值"。

span.span: The default is "startRowIndex".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于支持数据源分页。The property is used to support data source paging. 有关如何通过支持分页信息控制，请参阅。For information about how paging is supported by the control, see . 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够选择多少条记录显示在页中的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含控制其属性设置为`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为在查询中返回的记录总数的方法的名称。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和属性设置为选择的方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示的处理程序事件控件。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 中的处理程序集的代码于用户的所选内容的属性。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 在第三个示例从 Customers 表中检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，分配给属性控件。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包括一个名为方法`GetEmployeeCount`，分配给属性控件。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 查询客户表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法以将标记的起始点，若要开始对控件的跟踪并保存更改对象的视图状态的一部分。The method is overridden to mark the starting point to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the view state for the object.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象表示的类的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the class that the object represents.

value.span: 标识 表示的对象类型的部分或完全限定类名。

span.span: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the represents.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到创建的对象实例控件绑定到，该控件使用反射来加载由类型名称标识在运行时类型。To create an instance of the object that the control binds to, the control uses reflection to load the type that is identified by the type name at run time. 因此，值属性可以是位于 Bin 或 App_Code 目录中的代码的部分限定的类型或在全局程序集缓存中注册的代码的完全限定的类型名称。Therefore, the value of the property can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directories or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果你使用的全局程序集缓存，你必须添加对相应的引用`assemblies`Machine.config 或 Web.config 文件的部分。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config file. 该类型必须具有默认构造函数，除非你处理事件自行创建它的实例。The type must have a default constructor, unless you handle the event to create an instance of it yourself. 每次调用创建的类型实例， ， ，和方法，如果类型上的方法是成员方法。An instance of the type is created for each call to the , , , and methods, if the methods on the type are member methods. 如果方法是不创建实例`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)。An instance is not created if the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 如果该类型实现接口，销毁该对象前调用方法。If the type implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何控件可以显示数据，通过使用Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data by using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识部分或完全限定的类名称替换其属性和方法调用使用来检索数据其属性。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，创建对象并使用反射调用该方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举返回的集合属性，并显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the property, and displays the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示类引用属性值。The following example shows the class that the property value refers to. summary.span: 通过调用 属性标识的方法和 集合中的所有参数，执行更新操作。

span.span: Performs an update operation by calling the method that is identified by the property and any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 一个值，表示基础数据存储中更新的行数。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows updated in the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定的业务对象一次，而不是批处理中更新数据一条记录。The business object is assumed to update data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 之前执行操作，则调用方法来引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 若要执行更新操作，对象使用反射来创建由标识对象的实例属性。To perform an update operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 它然后调用由标识方法属性，使用任何关联属性。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 后操作完成，调用方法来引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理事件，以检查任何返回值、 输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法会委托给方法关联控件。The method delegates to the method of the that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 当与数据绑定控件，如关联控件控件，不需要调用从页的代码的方法。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件，并在几个对象来更新数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件，并在几个控件更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 Northwind 员工的名称时控制用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因为集合包含对象绑定到的所选值，引发的按钮操作将仅后选择员工时，才启用。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/northwindemployee12.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/northwindemployee12.vb#2)]
