summary.span: 在 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件检查返回值或输出参数的值，或者想要确定后是否引发了异常操作已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性就可以在与事件相关联的对象。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UpdateMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件调用以更新数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to update data.

value.span: 表示 用于更新数据的方法或函数的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to update data.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件假定由标识的方法属性一次，而不是批处理中的方式执行更新。The control assumes that the method that is identified by the property performs updates one at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给属性与关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 请确保参数名称为配置中控制集合选择的方法返回的列名称匹配。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 由标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁由指定的方法的每次调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 你可以处理和事件以使用指定的方法之前的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理由指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现接口，销毁该对象前调用方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 如果该方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，将永远不会创建业务对象，并且无法处理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合并的参数Parameter Merging 参数添加到从三个源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 从数据绑定控件，在运行时。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从`UpdateParameters`元素，以声明方式。From the `UpdateParameters` element, declaratively. - 从事件处理程序，以编程方式。From the event handler, programmatically. 首先，将通过数据绑定控件生成的任何参数添加到集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果控件绑定到具有列控件`Name`和`Number`的参数`Name`和`Number`添加到集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 取决于参数的确切名称属性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 这些参数的数据类型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步、 中列出的参数`UpdateParameters`添加元素。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `UpdateParameters` element are added. 如果中的参数`UpdateParameters`元素找到具有相同名称作为参数中已被修改集合，现有的参数以匹配中指定的参数`UpdateParameters`元素。If a parameter in the `UpdateParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `UpdateParameters` element. 通常，这用于修改在参数中的数据的类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，你可以以编程方式添加和删除中的参数事件，发生之前运行方法。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 对参数进行合并后，该方法将得到解决。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 在下一部分中讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 当调用方法时，从该数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`UpdateParameters`元素和参数中的新增所有合并事件处理程序。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `UpdateParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。控制然后尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与属性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则引发异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设由指定的类型属性有两个方法名为`UpdateARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `UpdateARecord`. 一个`UpdateARecord`具有一个参数、 `ID`，以及其他`UpdateARecord`具有两个参数，`Name`和`Number`。One `UpdateARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `UpdateARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合仅有一个参数名为`ID`、`UpdateARecord`方法只需`ID`调用参数。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `UpdateARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 参数的类型未签入解决方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序并不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置属性，以不同的方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 具有中指定的名称的方法中寻找属性，它采用一个类型的参数中指定属性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够检索和更新 Northwind 数据库中的 Employees 表中记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示一个网页，包含两个控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示从数据库的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索、 显示和修改中用户选定的员工记录的数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例演示处理程序和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序序列化包含员工表中检索到的数据的对象。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序反序列化中包含正在更新该数据记录的原始数据的视图状态的对象。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象作为参数传递给更新方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始数据必须传递到数据库，以便它可以用于检查是否已被其他进程修改数据。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 在第三个示例与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 查询和更新雇员表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和员工表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 属性指定的方法使用的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the method that is specified by the property.

value.span: ，包含由 属性指定的方法使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the method that is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和中包含的参数类型集合的名称和中的参数的类型必须匹配方法签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 参数名称受到属性和区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的参数取决于数据绑定控件，以声明方式，指定的参数和以编程方式添加的参数中的数据。The parameters in the collection depend on the data in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"参数合并"一节和[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see the "Parameter Merging" section in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索所包含的属性与关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件，并在几个对象来更新数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件，并在几个控件更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 Northwind 员工的名称时控制用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因为集合包含，它绑定到的所选值，引发的按钮操作将仅后选择员工时，才启用。Because the collection contains a that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/northwindemployee12.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/northwindemployee12.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化控件将执行更新操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 参数都可用作集合所访问的属性，公开的对象。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够检索和更新 Northwind 数据库中的 Employees 表中记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示一个网页，包含两个控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示从数据库的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索、 显示和修改中用户选定的员工记录的数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例演示处理程序和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序序列化包含员工表中检索到的数据的对象。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序反序列化中包含正在更新该数据记录的原始数据的视图状态的对象。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象作为参数传递给更新方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始数据必须传递到数据库，以便它可以用于检查是否已被其他进程修改数据。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 在第三个示例与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 查询和更新雇员表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和员工表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
